msbt.message: To stone-abs ,
What's up, ?
Hey, sit-up sidekick ,
To mega-delts ,
Muscle-superhero ,
Thanks for the card! Those were some really good words you sent.
Your card was such a surprise that I don't know what to write back.
Thanks for the card! I wish I could write mighty words like that.
I read your card so many times that my eyeceps started getting sore!
I read the card you sent me all the way to the end. What a workout!
I think writing letters hits different muscles than pumping iron. This is really, really hard.
I'm a lifter, not a letter-writer guy, so I'm getting a ton of mind-muscle soreness just writing this.
I got this awesome, ultra-heavy pen so I can tone my fingers while I write. First time using it!
Well, I spent a whole day writing that, so I'm gonna double up my reps tomorrow. Can't wait!
My brain muscle's all cramped up, so I don't know what else to say. Writer's blocks are heavy!
Well, we should hang out soon!
Time for a good, long jog.
Enough mind reps for one day.
Did you read to the end?
This letter came out awesome!
Yours in soreness,
Buds,
In it to win it,
Rippedly yours,
